Function reference

All functions

ARUtools-package ARUtools
ARUtools: CWS Ontario Tools for working with ARU files
add_sites()
Add site-level data to the metadata
add_wildtrax()
Add Wildtrax file name to metadata
calc_sel_pr()
Calculate Inclusion Probabilities
calc_sun()
Calculate time to sunrise/sunset
check_file()
Explore a file
check_meta()
Check output of `clean_metadata()`
check_problems()
Check problems in output of `clean_metadata()`
clean_gps()
Check and clean GPS data
clean_metadata()
Extract and clean ARU metadata from file names
clean_site_index()
Prepare and clean site index file
count_files()
Count files in a project directory
create_directory_structure()
Create directory structure for ARU folders
create_pattern_date() create_pattern_time() create_pattern_dt_sep() create_pattern_aru_id() create_pattern_site_id() test_pattern()
Create a pattern to match date
default_selection_parameters
Default parameters for use in `gen_dens_sel_simulation` and `calc_sel_pr`
example_clean example_clean
Example cleaned recording meta data
example_files
Example recording files
example_sites
Example site-level meta data
example_sites_clean
Example cleaned site-level meta data
format_clip_wave()
Process multiple wav files by copying them with a new filename or clipping to a given length.
format_clip_wave_single()
Clip single wave file to length from given start time in recording
fun_aru_samp()
Run the model function
gen_dens_sel_simulation()
Simulate selection probabilities for GRTS
get_file_info()
Get the file info from a recording
get_wav_length()
Get the length of a recording in seconds
getvals()
Get accoustic complexity values
play_random_track()
Play random track
prep_for_wind_detection()
Prepare files for WindNoiseDetection
process_gps_SM()
Process GPS locations for SongMeters
process_gps_barlt()
Process GPS log file for BarLT
process_log_SM()
Process log files from SongMeters
read_and_check_barlt_gps()
Read barlt gps and check locations
read_log_barlt()
Parse the log file for BarLT
read_summary_SM4()
Parse SM4 logfiles
soxSpectrogram()
Create spectrogram from wave file
wind_detection_pre_processing()
Pre-processing of files for Wind Detection program
wind_detection_summarize_json()
Summarize wind detection results
wt_assign_tasks()
Assign tasks for wildtrax interpretation

Developed by David Hope, Steffi LaZerte.
